description: JSON extraction for US Patent Application US 2023/0064918 A1 describing a CMP slurry composition with a precipitant.
experiment_context: General description of a CMP slurry composition containing a slurry (liquid carrier, oxidizer, abrasives, optional pH adjuster, optional corrosion inhibitor) and a precipitant. Designed to prevent corrosion of an underlying conductive layer (e.g., Co) when polishing an overlying conductive layer (e.g., W) by forming blocking layers in gaps (approx. 1-10 angstroms wide).

abrasive_synthesis.description: Abrasive synthesis details not provided in the patent text.

physical.description: Physical synthesis process stages not provided.

slurry_preparation.description: Slurry composition includes a base slurry and a precipitant. Base slurry contains liquid carrier, oxidizer, abrasives, optional pH adjuster, and optional corrosion inhibitor.

abrasive.material: silicon oxide particles, cerium oxide particles or the like

slurry_additives.name: Precipitant (e.g., magnesium nitrate, calcium nitrate, magnesium phosphate, calcium phosphate, or mixtures thereof; Cations: alkaline-earth like Be2+, Mg2+, Ca2+, Sr2+, Ba2+; Anions: P3-, NO2-, NO3-, PO43-, HPO42-, H2PO4-)
Corrosion Inhibitor (Optional, e.g., amino acid like glycine)
pH Adjusting Agent (Optional, Acidic: nitric acid, hydrochloric acid, sulfuric acid; Basic: potassium hydroxide, ammonium hydroxide)

processing.description: Dispersion of components in liquid carrier. pH adjustment.

agents.name: Acidic: nitric acid, hydrochloric acid, sulfuric acid; Basic: potassium hydroxide, ammonium hydroxide

characterization.description: Slurry characterization details not provided in the patent text.
